threshold_tuning.observation: STEEPs distribution: P=8, T=5, S=2, E_Econ=2, E_Env=2, s=1. Political category is over-represented (40%) — within acceptable range per core-invariants (max 50%), but trending up vs. 5-run average of 32%. Monitor next 2 runs.
threshold_tuning.recommendation: No adjustment — insufficient consecutive-run evidence (need 3). Continue monitoring P-category weighting.

agent_performance.observation: Phase 2 classification step took longer than average due to political signal density. No retries required today. Validation passed 17/17 on first attempt.
agent_performance.recommendation: No timeout adjustment needed. First-pass validation success rate: 100% (3 consecutive runs).

classification_quality.observation: P_Political dominance (8/20 = 40%) reflects genuine geopolitical concentration in today's signals (Iran, EU AI Act, US NIST, India summit, China minerals, Europe digital sovereignty). Not a classification bias — confirmed by source diversity. No correction needed.
classification_quality.recommendation: If P-category exceeds 50% in next run, investigate prompt drift.

workflow_efficiency.observation: 3-phase pipeline completed without gate failures. No bottlenecks detected. Phase 1→2→3 transition times within target.

hallucination_tracking.observation: 0 fabricated signal IDs detected. All signal IDs follow wf1-{YYYYMMDD}-{NNN} format. URL validity not machine-checked (no automated URL scanner), but all sources are established outlets (Reuters, Nature, IMF, WEF). Date anomaly rate: 0% — all signals within 24h scan window.

source_exploration.observation: No exploration run today. Existing source set (sources.yaml) covered geopolitical, economic, tech, and environmental signals adequately. Coverage gap: health/pandemic signals weak (only 1 WHO signal). Consider exploring public health outlets in next exploration cycle.
source_exploration.recommendation: Queue health source exploration for next cycle — MINOR proposal.

source_health.observation: No source failures reported today. All WF1 sources (Reuters, Nature, arXiv excluded, IMF, WEF blogs) responded normally.

minor_proposals.description: Queue public health source exploration (WHO, Lancet public blogs) for next exploration cycle to reduce pandemic/health signal gap
minor_proposals.evidence: 1/20 signals today from health domain vs. 5-run average of 2.1/20

summary: WF1 SIE 2026-02-19: 7개 분석 영역 모두 정상. 자동 적용 변경 0건. 마이너 제안 1건 (공중보건 소스 탐색 예약). P-카테고리 비중 모니터링 필요 (40%, 3연속 시 임계값 조정 검토).
